title: 83/246/EEC: Commission Decision of 9 March 1983 concerning aid for fuel granted by the Italian Government to Sicilian fishermen (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 9 March 1983
concerning aid for fuel granted by the Italian Government to Sicilian fishermen
(Only the Italian text is authentic)
(83/246/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The aid for fuel for Sicilian fishermen as provided for by the Italian Government for the second half of 1980, for 1981 and for 1982 is incompatible with the common market under Article 92 of the EEC Treaty. Such aid must accordingly be discontinued.
The Italian Republic shall inform the Commission, within one month from the date of notification of this Decision, of the measures taken to comply therewith.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 March 1983.
For the Commission
Giorgios CONTOGEORGIS
Member of the Commission
